articles.title: Shillong Teer result today 17.12.2021 first and second round numbers - India Today
articles.description: Shillong Teer first and second-round numbers for December 17 will be declared at meghalayateer.com. Shillong Teer is a lottery game conducted by the Khasi Hills Archery Sports Association.
